header_summary: I'm sorry, but it appears you haven't provided the actual text from the mailing lists that you want to be summarized. Could you please provide the text so I can assist you further?

active_posts.title: A proposal for a "PSBT for descriptors" format
active_posts.summary:
- SeedHammer is developing a compact output descriptor using PSBT encoding for metal backups.
- The proposal aligns with BIP standards, supports Miniscript, and includes additional metadata.
- Debates focus on encoding methods and integrating the new format with existing PSBT.

active_posts.title: Bitcoin Core 26.0 release candidate 3 available
active_posts.summary:
- Bitcoin Core v26.0rc3 is now available for download with a link to the official site.
- The source code is verified under a signed tag on GitHub for authenticity.
- Release notes detailing changes and improvements are available on GitHub.

active_posts.title: Mailing List Future
active_posts.summary:
- A new platform for the mailing list is needed by year-end due to the current one's shutdown.
- A variety of hosting options, including Google Groups and GitHub, were proposed with noted concerns.
- A vote on the final decision will occur next meeting; contributions can be submitted beforehand.
